title: Search Ads - Client Partner, Vietnam
summary: At Apple, we believe in the power of technology to enrich people’s lives. Everything we build is designed—first and foremost—with helping people in mind. We believe advertising is no different, and that its value should come from how it benefits customers, not what it extracts from them. Our Ad Platforms team applies that belief by delivering ads that contribute, helping people discover content, supporting creators, and protecting and respecting everyone’s privacy. Because when advertising is done right, it benefits everyone. We are seeking an experienced Search Ads - Client Partner with a real passion for B2B sales to join our Marketing Platforms team to help businesses with promotion and discovery across Apple Services. You have very strong communication and interpersonal skills, you are highly analytical, resourceful, customer focused, team oriented, and have the ability to work independently to meet revenue and business objectives. You have a proven track record of meeting or exceeding revenue targets in the mobile and app developer space with performance type advertisers and agencies.
description:
-  Manage relationships with clients and agencies in the performance marketing space
-  Maintain high level of outreach via email, phone and meetings to ensure a strong business pipeline
-  Develop a strategy for long-term success across your portfolio of clients & prospects
-  Act as a thought-leader with both clients and agencies
-  Work closely with your Manager & Platform Specialist team to ensure accurate execution and alignment with customer objectives
-  Use internal & external data sets to understand how to best help grow your customers business
key_qualifications:
This role focuses on Vietnam market so fluency in Vietnamese is required
Experience in performance media sales with at least 4 years experience using a self-serve type platform
Managed Vietnamese clients with domestic and export business in your previous roles
Deep understanding of the mobile ecosystem and in particular the ecommerce, gaming, media and finance verticals (not required but a plus)
Deep understanding of how Performance Advertisers go to market and measure success
Strategic selling aptitude working with developers, performance advertisers and advertising agencies
Relationships with local developer communities or trade organization a plus
Excellent communication and presentations skills - both in person and virtually
You possess strong collaboration skills and you're able to work in a dynamic, exciting environment
Extremely professional and positive demeanour
Track record of meeting and exceeding goals
education_experience: Bachelor’s degree in a related field or equivalent.
